name: Tiny Skellymancers Grand Arena
description:
Welcome to the arena

Welcome to the Tiny Skellymancers Grand Arena! Can you fight your way out of 10 waves of monsters and get an audience with Skellymancer himself? Equip yourself with upgrades, but beware: every upgrade for you gives another upgrade to your enemies.

Controls

WASD to walk

Left mouse to attack

Right mouse to shoot fireballs

Space to dash

Upgrades

  Attack Damage

   Spell Damage

  Movement Speed

  Max Health + Full Heal

  Max Mana + Full Mana

Credits

Code + Art by DudeNamedDaisy

Music + Boss Sound Effects by Gilvorn

General Sound Effects by SubspaceAudio: https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
